item.description:
I am hosting a movie screening this coming Friday at downtown Boston in the office building that I am in. If you are interested in Chinese film or simply a good romance/suspense story, you will not be disappointed. The movie will be played in Chinese sound with English subtitle. I am putting this event up at Boston China Interest Network too.

Plot:

A con-team couple (Andy Lau & Rene Liu) head west after taking a city businessman for his BMW. But an encounter with a naive young carpenter travelling home with his life savings challenges their fate as thieves.

 

IMDB:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0439884

Trailer:

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Movie Social: A World Without Thieves
